item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

Its[quote=“mr extremez, post:5, topic:447604”][quote author=Mee0345 link=topic=550503.msg4036033#msg4036033 date=1341208947]

name ; jesse
age ; 15
Timezone/location Canada GMT 4:00
Work of mine ; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=536244.0
Java ; i am very good at java i can code lots of objects npc, auto spawns, npc drops, torva,lots more etc.
Why do you want to join the team; i want to join the team because i would like to make a rsps that will be around for a long time.

lol, the stuff you said you could do is barely programming. I mean, rsps is hardly programming, but the things you stated are even worse.

This is true, he was meant to be on my development team but was denied.
Auto spawns, objects, npcs, npc drops are just editing a basic config file(.cfg)
That is not the work of yours… You are not featured in the credits.
[/quote]He has applied on a bunch of threads lol even mine.[/quote]
Still, its going to backfire on him if he gets accepted for more than 2 things… Working on 2 things at once… Well I guess its not that hard to edit cfg files xD

Read full topic
